branchCategory.name: CP96
branchCategory.description: CP96, profile tube design ISO cylinder with enclosed tie rods, is available in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.name: CP96S(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Double Acting, Single/Double Rod w/Air Cushion and Bumper Cushion
branchItem.description: CP96, profile tube design ISO cylinder with enclosed tie rods, is available in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  The series is available with a single or double rod in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm. The air cushion and bumper cushion combination greatly reduces noise at the end of stroke. High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life. Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod. Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.name: CP96S(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Single/Double Rod, 125 Bore
branchItem.description: CP96, profile tube design ISO cylinder with enclosed tie rods, is available in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.name: CP96K(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Non-rotating Rod Type, Double Acting, Single/Double Rod
branchItem.description: CP96K, profile tube design ISO cylinder with enclosed tie rods, The non-rotating rod version is available with a single or double rod in 5 bore sizes from ø32 to ø100mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.description: C(P)96 add on piston rod clevis.
